errTooLong.defaultMessage: The email is too long (255 characters is the limit).

errNoDigit.defaultMessage: The password must contain at least one digit.

errNoLower.defaultMessage: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter.

errNoSpecial.defaultMessage: The password must contain at least one special character.

errNoUpper.defaultMessage: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter.

errTooLong.defaultMessage: The password is too long (255 characters is the limit).
